text: Kim Dae-gon is a South Korean actor. He is known for his roles in dramas such as Touch Your Heart, My Country: The New Age and Hi Bye, Mama!. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
